Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Plaza Padova places you in the heart of Padova, walking distance from Piazza dei Signori and Loggia della Gran Guardia. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Padua Cathedral and Palazzo del Monte di Pieta.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 132 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Padova? This hotel has facilities measuring 80 square feet (7 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at Hotel Plaza Padova places you in the heart of Padova, walking distance from Piazza dei Signori and Loggia della Gran Guardia. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Padua Cathedral and Palazzo del Monte di Pieta.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza dei Signori - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Loggia della Gran Guardia - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Padua Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo del Monte di Pieta - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza del Duomo - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo della Ragione - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza delle Erbe - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museo del Risorgimento e Dell' eta Contemporanea - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Pedrocchi Cafe - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
University of Padova - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Moroni - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Zuckermann Palace - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Church of the Eremitani - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Eremitani Town Museums - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Chiesa di Santa Maria dei Servi - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Plaza Padova is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 38.2 km / 23.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
